metadata.synopsis: A small dialogue with Umberlee follower that came to Water Queen's House to give offerings to the Sea Queen.Ideas for a character: she hates Umberlee but too afraid to forget about "her part".

0.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
0.text: I'm trying to get my prayers straight - don't want to piss off the Bitch Queen.
0.context: NodeContext: Slightly irritated; a little hushed/wary after the -

1.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
1.text: Sorry, mate, no time to chat - just here to make an offering then leave. In and out, yeah?
